review: Very nice quality product and such a small device. Just plug it in follow the on screen directions and that is all there is to it. For WWE fans this device will connect you in a couple of clicks. I myself have no problem with the speech recognition on the tiny remote, just hold the button down and speak. The only drawback.................NO HBO.Amazon has now come out with a Fire TV stick to be released in 2015, and that will be my next addition since the Fire TV itself works so very fine I see every reason to expand it to all my TV's.Buy one and enjoy!
author: Sparkles "Pom & Dobe Lover"

review: After excellent performance since April 2014, on November 15, 2014, the Amazon Fire TV started NOT showing video for movies or videos.  The audio was OK.  I tried  to problem solve this using Amazon help.  I unplugged the device and re plugged it several times, checked the HDMI cable.  All that led to "no signal" messages on my TV.  I like this set box, and so bought another.  I would  think it should last for at least a year.  I have used Apple TV, but the Amazon Fire TV is easier especially with the voice recognition.Two days later I had swapped out the HDMI cable, restarted Amazon TV and had given up and ordered a new one.  Today I was fiddling with the remote.  It used to air on HDMI 2 and I played around and switched to to HDMI 3, and then happily it WORKED again.  Thanks to the people who had suggestions.  I tried them and did not give up hope.
